alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 21 at 2:58AM CST until February 21 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ THIS EVENING FOR VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR PORTIONS OF THE SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO PLAINS AND THE NORTHWEST PERMIAN BASIN... * AFFECTED AREA...Gaines, Dawson, Chaves Plains, Eddy Plains and Lea. * TIMING...Late Monday morning into Monday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * RFTI...4 or near critical to 6 critical.
info.instruction: Do not throw cigarettes onto the ground or out of a moving vehicle. Keep vehicles on driving surfaces and do not drive through tall grass. Avoid activities that may produce outdoor flames or sparks.
